name: Energetic Telephone
description:
You are in danger and you need to call someone for help, but your smartphone is broken and the only other phone in your possession is very energetic and constantly trying to run away...

Instructions:

Try to dial the displayed phone number before the timer runs out.

You can click the dial buttons with your left mouse button. 

Godot web export is still broken for 3D... so you have to download the game.
